title: Google begins project to make Android Studio more useful for OEMs and ROM developers
content:
Google is beginning a project that would elevate Android Studio from app development to a full suite for Android OS development by OEMs and ROM developers.

moreâ€¦

description: Google project would elevate Android Studio from app development to a full suite for Android OS development by OEMs and ROM developers.
